entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy this evening. 60 percent chance of light snow overnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near midnight then cloudy. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 1 April 2023
